It was already <lb n="c56-0045__main__9"/> one in the morning, the rain pattered <lb n="c56-0045__main__10"/> dismally against the window panes,&<lb n="c56-0045__main__11"/> my candle was nearly burnt out, when <lb n="c56-0045__main__12"/> by the glimmer of the half extinguish<lb n="c56-0045__main__13"/>ed light I saw the dull yellow eye of <lb n="c56-0045__main__14"/> the creature open.â€”It breathed hard, <lb n="c56-0045__main__15"/> and a convulsive motion agitated <lb n="c56-0045__main__16"/> its limbs.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0045__main__17"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0045__main__d2e9811"/>But how<del eID="c56-0045__main__d2e9811"/> How can I describe my <lb n="c56-0045__main__18"/> emotion at this catastrophe; or how deli<lb n="c56-0045__main__19"/>neate the wretch whom with such <lb n="c56-0045__main__20"/> infinite pains and care I had endeavoured <lb n="c56-0045__main__21"/> to form. His <lb n="c56-0045__main__24"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0045__main__d2e9876"/>dun<del eID="c56-0045__main__d2e9876"/><lb n="c56-0045__left_margin__1"/>yellow skin scarcely covered the work of <lb n="c56-0045__main__25"/> muscles and arteries beneath; his hair <lb n="c56-0045__main__26"/> was<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0045.03">^</metamark><lb n="c56-0045__left_margin__1"/>of a lustrous black & flowing and his teeth of a pearly white<lb n="c56-0045__main__27"/>ness but these luxuriancies only <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0045__main__d2e9922"/>fomed<del eID="c56-0045__main__d2e9922"/><lb n="c56-0045__main__28"/> formed a more horrid contrast with <lb n="c56-0045__main__29"/> his watry eyes that seemed almost of <lb n="c56-0045__main__30"/> the same colour as the dun white <lb n="c56-0045__main__31"/> sockets in which they were set,<lb n="c56-0046__main__1"/> his shrivelled complexion and strait <lb n="c56-0046__main__2"/> black lips.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0046__main__3"/>the different accidents of life are <lb n="c56-0046__main__4"/> not so changeable as the feelings of hu<lb n="c56-0046__main__5"/>man nature.
